tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    favorite_cuisine VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
country VARCHAR(50),
preference VARCHAR(50),
allergies VARCHAR(100) );

CREATE TABLE meals (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
meal_name VARCHAR(50),
cuisine_type VARCHAR(50),
spiciness_level VARCHAR(50),
ingredients VARCHAR(100) );

CREATE TABLE Meals (
  meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cuisine VARCHAR(50),
  main_dish VARCHAR(100),
  side_dish VARCHAR(100),
  drink VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Customer (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    preference TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Restaurant (
    restaurant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    cuisine_type VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  cuisine_preference VARCHAR(50),
  spice_level INT,
  dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE cuisines (
  cuisine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cuisine_name VARCHAR(50),
  country_name VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (country_name) REFERENCES countries(country_name)
)

CREATE TABLE dishes (
  dish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dish_name VARCHAR(100),
  cuisine_id INT,
  flavor_profile VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (cuisine_id) REFERENCES cuisines(cuisine_id)
)
